summary: PROBLEM IS THE WINDSHIELD. PART OF THE WHINDSHILED REFLECTS PICTURE OF THE DASHBOARD WHILE DRIVING  UNDER CERTAIN SUNLIGHT CONDITION.  PICTURE OF THE DASHBOARD APPEARS ON THE WINDSHIELD  UNDER CERTAIN SUNLIGHT CONDATION. . THE BOTTOM OF THE WINDSHIELD WORKS LIKE A MIRROR. PICTURE GOES AND COMES DEPENDING ON THE REFLECTING OF SUNGLIGHT
